nodes.bodyText: Is that assertion still useful then? It probably mean to assert that the value gets updated

I was hesitant whether to remove it or not. I kept it mostly as a pointer to impossibility to test this properly today, so that someon doesn't re-add it in the future without thinking.
thoughts?
For DF we removed assertions and added comment in code that points to issue on github, see io.prestosql.plugin.hive.TestHiveDynamicPartitionPruning#testJoinWithSelectiveBuildSide
